t: The Complete Guide to Amazon’s Private Label Brands | Pattern

t: 20 Top Private Label Brands from Amazon - Practical Ecommerce

t: How Amazon’s big private-label business is growing and leaving small brands to protect against knockoffs
s: October 12, 2022 - What Amazon lacked in originality and quality it made up for in price. While Peak's bag currently costs almost $90 on Amazon, the knockoff version from Amazon's homegrown AmazonBasics brand was selling for about two-thirds less.
